actId	idx	desc	rewardMoney	rewardTarot	rewardRMB	rewardItem	rewardItemShow	needBuyUnbindRMB	needPurgatoryId	needPurgatoryPassCnt	needFinishGVEFBCnt	needJJCCnt	needFinishFBCnt	needFinishUnionFBCnt	needSlavePlayCnt	needOnlineTime	HeroLevel	HeroIds	maxCnt	needGoldCnt	WingculCnt	GemsynCnt	SaveSlaveCnt	challengeTimes	costRMB	PetevlTimes	Petstar	needMountTrainCnt	needMountRMBTrainCnt	EvlHoleTimes	CatchSlaveTimes	ChallengHeroTimes	TotalcostRMB	PetSpiritLevel	PetLuckyDraw	EquipmentStengCnt	PetEvoId	tarotCntDict	tarotCnt	dayBuyGem	fuwenSyn	partytimes	CFbtimes
